lyrics.text:
’I he feinga lahi
Mo e fa’a mamahi;
Te mou hoko ‘o lava’i
‘A e pule’anga.

’Oku kalanga mai,
Homou Kapiteni;
‘Oua na’a manavahē
Ka mou fai mālohi.

He na’a ku ‘ilo
Hono faingata’a
‘O e me’a kotoa pē
‘Oku mou mo’ua ai.

Te mou mo’ua foki,
‘I he ngaahi ngāue;
Ka mou ta’e tokanga’i,
Koe’uhi ko au.

’Oku ‘ikai mafai,
Foki ‘e māmani
Ke toe tali ‘a e Hau,
Na’a ne ‘iku’i.
